mapper.select: SELECT T1.CNTR_NO /*계약정보*/ , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.CST_NM , T1.PD_CD , T1.PD_NM , T1.ACDN_RCP_ID , T1.ACDN_RCP_NM , T1.IST_ZIP , T1.IST_ADR , T1.IST_DTL_ADR , T1.IST_REFER_ADR , T1.LOCARA_TNO --전화번호 , T1.EXNO_ENCR , T1.IDV_TNO , T1.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO --휴대전화번호 , T1.MEXNO_ENCR , T1.CRAL_IDV_TNO , T1.IST_DT --매출일 , T1.RCPDT --접수일 , T1.VST_DT --방문일 , T1.ACDN_DTM -- 사고일시 , T1.SV_CNR_OG_ID --센터id , T1.SV_CNR_NM --센터명 , O1.HOO_PRTNR_NO AS CNRLD_NO --등록자사번(센터장사번) , T1.CNRLD_NM --센터장명 , T1.IST_LCT_DTL_CN --위치 , T1.IMPTA_RSON_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'IMPTA_RSON_CD', T1.IMPTA_RSON_CD, #{session.langId}) AS IMPTA_RSON_NM --귀책사유 , T1.AGR_DOC_FW_YN , T1.AGR_DOC_RCV_YN , T1.RCP_MO_CN --접수내용 , T1.ACDN_CAUS_CN --사고원인 /* 사고정보 */ , T1.CST_DMD_CN --고객요구 , T1.ACDN_RS_CN --결과 , T1.CPS_DV_CD , T1.FSH_DT , T1.CPS_PRGS_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'CPS_PRGS_CD', T1.CPS_PRGS_CD, #{session.langId}) AS CPS_PRGS_NM , NVL(T1.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) AS TOT_CPS_AMT , T1.KRN_TOT_CPS_AMT_MRK_NM , NVL(T1.KW_CPS_AMT,0) AS KW_CPS_AMT , NVL(T1.INSRCO_CPS_AMT,0) AS INSRCO_CPS_AMT , T1.PSIC_NM --보상담당자 , T1.VST_IZ , T1.DAMG_IZ , T1.EST_IZ , T1.AGR_IZ , NVL(T1.TOT_RDU_AMT,0) AS TOT_RDU_AMT , T1.CST_SIGN_CN AS SIGN_CN , T1.MAAS_BRYY_MMDD AS MAAS_BIRTH_DATE , T1.MAAS_FNM , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'CST_REL_CD', T1.FML_REL_DV_CD1, #{session.langId}) AS FML_REL_DV_NM1 , T1.RFND_ACNO_ENCR , T1.RFND_ACOWN_NM , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'BNK_CD', T1.RFND_BNK_CD, #{session.langId}) AS RFND_BNK_NM , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'CST_REL_CD', T1.FML_REL_DV_CD2, #{session.langId}) AS FML_REL_DV_NM2 , NVL(T1.WRTE_DT,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS WRTE_DT , T1.ACDN_PHO_APN_DOC_ID , T1.ACDN_PICTR_APN_DOC_ID , T1.CAUS_ANA_APN_DOC_ID FROM TB_SVPD_ACDN_DOAN_IZ T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ O1 ON O1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(T1.RCPDT,1,6) AND O1.OG_ID = T1.SV_CNR_OG_ID AND O1.OG_LEVL_DV_CD = '1' AND O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.ACDN_RCP_ID = #{acdnRcpId} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ T1 SET T1.SFT_ACDN_YN='Y' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = (SELECT MAX(CST_SV_ASN_NO) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ WHERE CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT C1.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , C1.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , T4.CST_KNM AS CST_NM /*설치고객명*/ , PD.PD_ABBR_NM AS PD_NM /*제품명*/ , C2.LOCARA_TNO /*설치자 지역전화번호*/ , C2.EXNO_ENCR /*설치자 전화국번호암호화*/ , C2.IDV_TNO /*설치자 개별전화번호*/ , C2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*설치자 휴대지역전화번호*/ , C2.MEXNO_ENCR /*설치자 휴대전화국번호암호화*/ , C2.CRAL_IDV_TNO /*설치자 휴대개별전화번호*/ , C1.CNTR_PD_STRTDT /* 매출일자 ??? */ , T5.NEW_ADR_ZIP AS IST_ZIP /* 설치우편번호 */ , T5.RNADR AS IST_ADR /* 설치자주소 */ , T5.RDADR AS IST_DTL_ADR /* 상세주소 */ , T1.RCPDT /* A/S접수일자 */ , T2.SV_CNR_OG_ID /* 센터 OG_ID */ , O1.HOO_PRTNR_NM AS CNR_LEADER_NM /* 센터장명 */ , D1.IST_LCT_DTL_CN /* 위치 */ , T1.CNSL_MO_CN AS RCP_MO_CN , E1.IST_DT /* 설치일자 */ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ E1 ON C1.CNTR_NO = E1.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = E1.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ T1 /*고객서비스AS설치대상내역*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T1.AS_IST_OJ_NO = (SELECT MAX(AS_IST_OJ_NO) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ WHERE CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ T2 /*고객서비스AS설치배정내역*/ ON T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T2.CST_SV_ASN_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL CR1 ON CR1.DTL_CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND CR1.DTL_CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND CR1.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2', '3') /*계약주소*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS C2 /*계약주소지기본-계약주소*/ ON C2.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = CR1.CNTR_ADRPC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS T5 /*주소기본-설치주소*/ ON T5.ADR_ID = C2.ADR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T4 /*고객기본-설치고객*/ ON T4.CST_NO = C2.CNTR_CST_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ O1 /* 월조직내역 */ ON O1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(T2.ASN_DT, 1, 6) AND O1.OG_ID = T2.SV_CNR_OG_ID AND O1.OG_LEVL_DV_CD = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS PD /*상품기본*/ ON PD.PD_CD = C1.BASE_PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_CNTR_PDCT_IST_LCT_DTL D1 ON D1.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND D1.CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND D1.DTL_SN = (SELECT MAX(DTL_SN) FROM TB_SVPD_CNTR_PDCT_IST_LCT_DTL WHERE CNTR_NO = D1.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = D1.CNTR_SN ) WHERE C1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND C1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}
